attributes.action: Abolish the exisiting Human Rights Bill and replace with British Bill of Rights
attributes.additional_details: The existing Human Rights Bill is seen to work in favour of convicted criminals escaping deportation from the UK to the detriment of the public. I request that the Government honour its pre-election promise to abolish this one-sided Bill and replace as a matter of urgency a British Bill of Rights which protects the general British public from convicted foreign criminals and allows their deportation after release from prison.
